metaTags.metaDescription: We cite our connectivity cloud as the best platform built to converge workspace security with coffee shop networking

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: A Visionary in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare views this evaluation as a significant recognition of our strategy to help connect and secure workspace security and coffee shop networking.
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is one of only 11 vendors recognized in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms report.

Our vision is to remove complexity from our customers' SASE journey, and we feel our unique connectivity cloud approach sets us apart:

- Composable, cloud-native services help organizations enforce controls consistently from SSE to the broader workspace, including email, in any order
- Unified, consistent network architecture delivers performance and reliability everywhere to simplify branch connectivity using a 'coffee shop' model
- Proprietary developer platform accelerates our time-to-market for new capabilities and helps us keep up with new security protocols and Internet standards, e.g., post-quantum cryptography

Download the report to learn how Cloudflare is evaluated as a Visionary.

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
Gartner, Magic Quadrant for SASE Platforms, Analyst(s): Jonathan Forest, Neil MacDonald, Dale Koeppen, July 15, 2025
